div.div: The mission of Leyton Public Schools is to cultivate life long learners as they successfully transition into our diverse world.

font.marquee: NO ON SITE SCHOOL UNTIL FURTER NOTICE. E-Learning school starts 3/30! ALL SCHOOL ACTIVITIES SUSPENDED AND DISTRICT BUILDINGS ARE CLOSED TO THE PUBLIC!

span.b: The Board of Education of Cheyenne County School District #3 (Leyton Public Schools) will meet in regular session, Monday, April 20, 2020 at 7:30 p.m. This meeting will be held virtually via the Zoom application.
Connection details are also available on the District Website for any and all who wish to participate.

The agenda for said meeting, which shall be kept continuously current, is available for public review during regular business hours in the District’s Administrative Office located at 504 Main Street, Dalton, NE.
